mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, user_phone, user_email, user_add, user_birth, user_zonecode, role) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{user_add}, #{user_birth}, #{user_zonecode}, 'user')
mapper.select: select username, password, user_phone, user_email, user_add, user_birth, role From user where username = #{username}
SELECT IF(COUNT(username) = 1, 1, 0) as result from user where username = #{username} and user_email = #{email};
select username from user where user_email = #{email}
